venue.fullName: David S. Mack Sports and Exhibition Complex

article.headline: Hofstra 73, Stony Brook 56
article.story: HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) -- Loren Stokes became Hofstra's 26th 1,000-point scorer Wednesday night, scoring 29 points on 11-of-14 shooting in the Pride's 73-56 victory over winless Stony Brook. Zygis Sestokas added 10 points for Hofstra (5-2), which led 33-21 at the half. Mike Popoko led Stony Brook (0-6) with 15 points. Stokes scored eight points to help the Pride, 16-3 overall against Stony Brook, take a 17-0 lead, their largest advantage of the game.
